hanzi-su-wiki:
誠

Значения

Правдивость, истинность; истина

Мнемоника

Правдивость, когда сказанное 言 имеет место быть 成.

Варианты

诚
purpleculture_pinyin:
chéng
sincere; authentic; really; truly
искренний; аутентичный; В самом деле; действительно
rtega_mnemonic:
誠誠RS
诚诚		sincere, honest, true, real
  • complete 成 words 言: they will become 成 true and are sincere
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 诚)
Pictophonetic: 成 indicates the sound; 言 (speech) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
誠信 [ chéng xìn ]: genuine; honest; in good faith; honesty; integrity
誠實 [ chéng shí ]: honest; honesty; honorable; truthful
誠意 [ chéng yì ]: sincerity; good faith
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 言 [ yán ] words, speech; to speak, to say
    • 成 [ chéng ] to accomplish; to become; to complete, to finish; to succeed
heisig_chinese_memo: Sincereity happens when what you say actually turns into something.
heisig_constituent: sincerity, say, words, keitai, mouth, turn into, sword, dagger, parade
heisig_story: The sure sign of sincerity is that one's mere words are turned into deeds.
Keyword_KANJIDIC: sincerity, admonish, warn, prohibit, truth, fidelity
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: искренность, увещевать, предупреждать, запрещать, правда, верность
koohiiStory1: Sincerity happens when what you say actually turns into something.
koohiiStory2: Sincerity is turning your words into actions.
jp_example_words:
誠実(せいじつ): sincere, honest, faithful
誠(まこと): truth, faith, fidelity, sincerity, trust, confidence, reliance, devotion
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Something you say to someone you become attached to should be said with sincerity. You need to speak with sincerity when you say things to someone who will eventually become your significant other, for example.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine saying something with sincerity to someone you want to become important to you. Say something like, “I love you” out loud. Say it with the utmost sincerity.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: When you say something with complete, unabashed sincerity your special saber (せい) starts to pulse with the beating of your heart. It shows the person you want to become close to that you truly are sincere!
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Say, "I love you," again and watch your saber beating in time with your heart. If you weren't sincere it would fade and grow dull.
Ru_Meaning: sincerity, admonish, warn, prohibit, truth, fidelity
Ru_Notes: Фонетик: 成 (なる、セイ、ジョウ становиться).
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the words (言) become (成) sincere
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Words can turn into acts of sincerity (sincere).

誠字的基本解释

誠
chéng
见“诚”。

誠字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chéng］
［《廣韻》是征切，平清，禪。］
“诚1”的繁体字。
(1)诚实；真诚；忠诚。
(2)真实。
(3)实情；真情。
(4)心志专一；专一的心志。
(5)谓使之专诚；使之真诚。
(6)真正；确实。
(7)假如。
(8)通“請”。

誠字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　誠； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1163第12
【唐韻】氏征切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】時征切，?音成。【說文】信也。【廣雅】敬也。【增韻】純也，無僞也，眞實也。【易·乾卦】閑邪存其誠。【疏】言防閑邪惡，當自存其誠實也。【書·太甲】鬼神無常享，享于克誠。【傳】言鬼神不係一人，能誠信者則享其祀。【眞德秀曰】唐虞時未有誠字，《舜典》允塞卽誠之義。至伊尹告太甲始見誠字。【禮·樂記】著誠去僞，禮之經也。【中庸】誠者，天之道也。誠之者，人之道也。【註】誠者，眞實無妄之謂。　又【玉篇】審也。【禮·經解】故衡誠縣，不可欺以輕重。【註】誠，猶審也。或作成。　又郡名。【唐書·地理志】悉州歸誠郡。　又州名。【唐書·地理志】嶺南道有思誠州。　又叶?羊切，音嘗。【韓愈·歐陽生哀辭】哭泣無益兮，抑哀自彊。推生知死兮，以慰孝誠。

(2) Reality.
(3) The truth; the truth.
(4) Single-minded; single-minded.
(5) To make it sincere; make it sincere.
(6) True; indeed.

[Yi·Qian Gua] Leisurely evils preserve their sincerity. 【Sparse】You should keep your honesty when you speak against the evil in idleness. 【Book·Taijia】The impermanence of ghosts and gods is enjoyed by Kecheng. [Legend] It is said that ghosts and gods do not belong to one person, and those who can be honest enjoy their sacrifices. [Zhu Dexiu said] There was no word for honesty in Tang Yu, and the "Shun Dian" allowed for the meaning of honesty. When Yi Yin reported to Taijia, he began to see the word of sincerity. 【Li·Le Ji】To remove the false with sincerity, the classics of rituals are also. 【The Doctrine of the Mean】The honest, the way of heaven. Name meaning

chéng
вм. 诚
Radicals: 言, 成  (say, become)
Meaning Mnemonic
Something you say to someone you become attached to should be said with sincerity. You need to speak with sincerity when you say things to someone who will eventually become your significant other, for example.
Imagine saying something with sincerity to someone you want to become important to you. Say something like, “I love you” out loud. Say it with the utmost sincerity.
Reading Mnemonic
When you say something with complete, unabashed sincerity your special saber (せい) starts to pulse with the beating of your heart. It shows the person you want to become close to that you truly are sincere!
Say, "I love you," again and watch your saber beating in time with your heart. If you weren't sincere it would fade and grow dull.
